tool_description:
Get Country and City Data.

I created this API for web forms that require location information. I found that what was currently available required was not suitable for my needs or I had to make an excessive amount of API calls to make it work.

The whole concept behind this is API is to first grab all countries and their regions, this will serve for "Select Country" and "Select Region" drop down boxes. This call is very fast. Then take the ISO2 and RC from the selected options, send them to t...
name: Geo Data
title: Geo Data

api_list.name: /CountryData
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geo-data.p.rapidapi.com/CountryData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geo-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geo-data.p.rapidapi.com/CountryData"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geo-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
